          <title>
            <string language="de">Insekten und Wirbeltiere im Vergleich: Der Blutkreislauf</string>
            <string language="en">Comparison of insects and vertebrates: Blood circulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparaison des insectes et des vertébrés : 
Circulation de sang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparação dos insetos e dos vertebrados: 
Circulação do sangue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronto degli insetti e dei vertebrati: 
Circolazione di anima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση των εντόμων και των σπονδυλωτών: 
Κυκλοφορία αίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparación de insectos y de vertebrados: 
Circulación de la sangre</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Illustriertes Arbeitsblatt zum offenen Blutkreislauf der Insekten und dem geschlossenen Blutkreislauf des Menschen. Fünf Fragen.</string>
            <string language="en">Illustrated worksheet on the open circulation of insects and the closed circulation of humans. Five questions</string>

          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha ilustrada na circulação aberta dos

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro illustrato sulla circolazione

ερωτήσεις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo ilustrada en la circulación 
abierta de insectos y la circulación cerrada de seres humanos. 
Cinco preguntas</string>
